item.title: The Trials and Tribulations of Growing Mushrooms: A Story of Setbacks and Perseverance
item.description:
The Trials and Tribulations of Growing Mushrooms: A Story of Setbacks and Perseverance

Hey there, my fellow fungi enthusiasts! Today, I want to share a personal story about my mushroom growing journey. It’s not all sunshine and rainbows – there have been plenty of bumps along the way. From battling bacteria to dealing with video censorship on YouTube, I’ve faced my fair share of challenges. But through it all, I’ve learned some valuable lessons about resilience and finding my way back on the path.

item.title: Rabbithole223: Business Objectives 2024
item.description:
Summary

Rabbithole223 social media brand focused on mushroom growing and product reviews. We aim to enlighten and engage mushroom hobbyists and home growers. I am publishing this to be clear about my goals. Revenue is the focus for the first half of 2024. If we are successful in the next first few goals I will update with more. I really enjoy content from the To Dreams Of A Million youtube channel [To Dreams Of A Million] https://www.youtube.com/@dreamsofamillion and figured putting this plan out there is way to hold myself to a goal.
